text: “læa cng raluk khna thi phracea khxng cea di xea cak luk hlan khx ngxadam sung luk «khxng phwk khea cak hlang khxng phwk khea læa hı phwk khea yunyan kætaw khxng khea xeng(doy txb khatham thi wa) kha michı phracea khxng phwk cea dxk hrux? Phwk khea klaw wa chı khxrab phwk kha phraxngkh khx yunyan (mi channan) phwk cea ca klaw nı wan ki ya mah wa thæcring phwk kha phraxngkh miru reuxng keiyw kab reuxng ni”
